Header: Measures taken to quell drug shortage
Content: A special team has been appointed to solve drugs and pharmaceuticals shortage in the country. According to the Ministry of Health, there is a shortage of 80 drug varieties. Minister Rajitha Senaratne has given instructions to import the necessary drug varieties with immediate effect to quell the situation. According to the Ministry sources, the drug shortage has taken place due to the recent political turmoil in the country as procuring process was hindered.
